attributes.comment:
RE: USCIS-2006-0044-0001
Adjustment of the Immigration Benefit Application/ Petition and Biometric Fee
Schedule

I am very concerned about the proposed increase in fees for this process.
Adoption is already a very expensive endeavor, often costing thens of thousands
of dollars per child. It seems incredible to me that our government would even
charge a family for these documents, much less increase the already high costs
incurred. The number of families that need these documents is relatively small;
however, the image of the US government being insensitive to families who make
perosnal sacrifices to bring orphans into their homes would generate significant ill
will This is not the way to balance a budget.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Ron E. Cody
